  • Constructor Details

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(String applicantNric, String projectName, FlatType flatTypeApplied, Date applicationDate)
      Constructs a new BTOApplication when an applicant first applies. The application ID is automatically generated based on NRIC and project name. Initial status is set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant. Cannot be null.
      projectName - The name of the project being applied for. Cannot be null.
      flatTypeApplied - The type of flat applied for. Cannot be null.
      applicationDate - The date the application was submitted. Cannot be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is null.

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(String applicationId, String applicantNric, String projectName, FlatType flatTypeApplied, ApplicationStatus status, Date applicationDate)
      Constructs a BTOApplication object when loading data from storage. Allows setting all fields, including the application ID and status. Includes warnings for potentially inconsistent data (e.g., BOOKED status with null flat type).
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The unique ID of the application. Cannot be null.
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant. Cannot be null.
      projectName - The name of the project. Cannot be null.
      flatTypeApplied - The type of flat applied for. Can be null but issues warning if status implies it shouldn't be.
      status - The status of the application. Cannot be null.
      applicationDate - The date the application was submitted. Cannot be null.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if required fields are null.
